Package com.example.moodsync

Class PhotoAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String>
com.example.moodsync.PhotoAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class PhotoAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String>
A custom adapter for displaying a list of photos in a ListView. The adapter uses Glide to load images from URLs and provides functionality to save, update, and manage image URLs using SharedPreferences.

  • Nested Class Summary

    A helper class for managing and loading photos into a ListView.

    • saveImageUrls

      public void saveImageUrls()
      Saves the current list of image URLs to SharedPreferences. This allows the URLs to persist across app sessions.

    • updateImageUrls

      public void updateImageUrls(List<String> newImageUrls)
      Updates the adapter with a new list of image URLs and saves them to SharedPreferences.
      Parameters:
      newImageUrls - A list of new image URLs to replace the current list.

    • addImageUrl

      public void addImageUrl(String imageUrl)
      Adds a new image URL to the adapter's list if it is not already present. The updated list is saved to SharedPreferences.
      Parameters:
      imageUrl - The URL of the new image to add.
